warning.message: Please restart Ascendara without administrator privileges. Running in administrator mode causes path finding issues and other problems.
warning.title: Cannot run in administrator mode

brokenVersion.description: This version of Ascendara contains known critical issues with its functionality, like downloads, updating, and other core functions.
brokenVersion.development: While using this version you may encounter issues or crashes. Please update Ascendara to the latest version from the website.
brokenVersion.title: You're running a broken version

crashScreen.clearCache: Clear your browser cache and cookies
crashScreen.contactSupport: If the issue persists, please report it to support
crashScreen.description: Ascendara did not like what just happened. No worries, if you have analytics enabled this error has been tracked and the developer will get this fixed.
crashScreen.title: Oh no...
crashScreen.troubleshooting: Try these steps to resolve the issue:

warning.description: You are currently using Ascendara on a non-Windows platform. While cross-platform is in development, some features may not work as expected.
warning.development: Ascendara is still in active development, and it is recommended that you use Windows for the best experience. I appreciate your patience and feedback as I continue to improve cross-platform support.
warning.title: Platform Compatibility Notice

qbittorrent.checkWebUI: Please check if qBittorrent is running with Web UI enabled
qbittorrent.configInstructions: Please set your qBittorrent WebUI credentials to username 'admin' and password 'adminadmin' to enable torrent functionality.

supportDialog.message: I know I said no ads but is this really an ad? You're starting to use Ascendara and I would love for you to rate it or give me some feedback. You won't ever see this message again.
supportDialog.note: I've spent so much time creating Ascendara as a passion project. Every feature, every line of code is crafted with care. Your support means everything to me and helps me continue making Ascendara even better.
supportDialog.title: Let me know how you like it

toasts.buildSwitchReadyDesc: The selected build has been downloaded. Install now to switch versions.
toasts.experimentOutOfDate: This build is out of date
toasts.experimentOutOfDateDesc: It is recommended that you stay on the latest experimental build.
toasts.experimentUpdateReadyDesc: A new experimental build is available. Ascendara can update automatically to it.
toasts.outOfDateDesc: Please download the latest version from the official website
toasts.switchToExperimentalDesc: Switch to the experimental build to test new features and provide feedback.
toasts.switchToStableDesc: Switch to the stable build of Ascendara for the most reliable experience.
toasts.updateReadyDesc: Ascendara downloaded the update and is ready to install and restart now

reportDialog.authFailedDesc: Unable to authenticate. Please try again later.
reportDialog.couldNotReportDesc: Your report was not submitted. Please try again later.
reportDialog.description: Help improve Ascendara by reporting any issues you encounter.
reportDialog.detailsPlaceholder: Please provide more details about the issue...
reportDialog.missingInfoDesc: Please fill out all required fields.
reportDialog.ratingFailedDesc: Your rating was not submitted. Sorry about that!
reportDialog.title: Report Issue

download.allDlcTooltip: Includes all downloadable content (DLC) available for this game
download.dmcaNotice: DMCA Notice: Ascendara uses outsourced links and files and does not host anything on its own servers.

downloadOptions.getExtension: Don't have the extension? Get it for Chrome or Firefox

gofileInstructions.action: Simply click on Download Now to start downloading this game.
gofileInstructions.description: Unlike other providers that require a CAPTCHA verification, GoFile allows direct downloads through their API.

handlerInstructions.step1: Open the link in your browser and enable the extension
handlerInstructions.step2: Complete the CAPTCHA and start the download
handlerInstructions.step3: The extension will automatically stop the download and start it for you in Ascendara

downloadOptions.invalidLink: Please enter a valid download link for

manualInstructions.step1: Copy and paste the link into your browser
manualInstructions.step2: Complete the CAPTCHA and start the download
manualInstructions.step3: Stop the download once it starts in your browser
manualInstructions.step4: Hit CTRL+J to open your downloads
manualInstructions.step5: Copy the link that the browser started downloading
manualInstructions.step6: Paste the DDL in the input box and click Download Now

downloadOptions.noProviders: No download providers available for this game.
downloadOptions.pasteLink: Paste your direct download link (DDL) here
downloadOptions.selectProviderPrompt: Please select a download provider to see the instructions.

torrentInstructions.description: Click the button below to download the torrent file. Make sure you have a torrent client installed and a VPN enabled for safe downloading.
torrentInstructions.noTorrent: qBittorrent WebUI cannot be accessed. Check settings for more information.
torrentInstructions.title: Download via Torrent

downloadOptions.waitingForBrowser: Waiting for your browser to send the download...

download.gameNeedsEmulator: This requires an emulator to run.
download.gameNeedsVR: VR may be required for this game.
download.igdbRating: This game is rated {{rating}} apples. Apple ratings are different than Star ratings on Ascendara, and are more of a general rating of the game.

newUserGuide.description: You haven't installed a game before, so Ascendara will guide you through the setup process.

steps.description: The Ascendara Download Handler will automatically stop the download in your browser and start it for you in Ascendara. If you don't have it, close the guide and click the "Don't have the extension? Get it for Chrome or Firefox" button to download it.
steps.title: The Ascendara Download Handler

steps.description: After installing the extension, click the extension icon to enable the handler.
steps.title: Step 1: Enable the Handler

steps.description: The extension can stay on as it will only send known providers to Ascendara.
steps.title: The Download Handler

steps.description: Complete the CAPTCHA, and start the download.
steps.title: Step 2: Start the download

steps.description: Once the download tries to start, you will see a popup asking to open Ascendara. Toggle the always allow button to allow the extension to always send known providers to Ascendara.
steps.title: Step 3: Using the Extension

steps.description: Click the button to Open Ascendara.
steps.title: Step 4: Downloading

steps.description: Your download will automatically start in Ascendara. If you're not brought to the download page, navigate to it.
steps.title: That's it!

newUserGuide.title: Downloading with Ascendara

download.noGameInfoAvailable: Setup Ascendara Xtra in Preferences to see more information about this game
download.onlineFixWarningDescription: This game comes with Online-Fix installed, when you launch it you will see a prompt telling you that it is made by Online-Fix team. This is normal and should only show once ever for each game with it.
download.onlineTooltip: Online multiplayer capabilities enabled through online-fix.me
download.pressEscToGoBack: Press ESC key to go back

protectYourself.learnHow: How to protect yourself from fake downloads
protectYourself.warning: Do not click on any ads or deceptive download buttons. The file size should match what you see here - be suspicious of small KB-sized files.

download.ratingTooltip: This game is rated {{rating}} out of 5 stars by others on Ascendara. Read comments about this game in the Discord server.
download.reportDescription: Please provide more details about the issue
download.reportError: Please provide a reason and details for your report
download.reportReason: Why are you reporting this game?
download.scrollToViewMore: Scroll to view more game details

selectPath.description: You have additional directories set in your preferences, choose from one below to download this game.
selectPath.title: Where do you want to download this game?

toast.invalidLink: Please enter a valid download link
toast.invalidProtocolUrl: Sent URL is invalid. Please try again
toast.noGameData: No game data was passed down

update.description: This will reinstall the game in the same directory. While most games save data in separate locations, it is recommended to back up any important save files or custom content before proceeding with the update.
update.title: Ready to update {{game}}?

actions.legacyGameVerification: File verification is only available for games downloaded after Ascendara version 8.1.2
actions.stopDownloadDescription: Are you sure you want to stop this download? You can choose to keep or delete the downloaded contents.

downloads.contentTypeError: Received content type error from downloader. Download link most likely expired
downloads.errorHelp: The download issue should already be reported. If the issue persists, please join the tagoWorks Discord server for support.
downloads.errorReportedDescription: Thank you for helping improve Ascendara. Ascendara developer team will investigate this issue.
downloads.extractingDescription: Extracting game files may take up to 30 minutes depending on the file size.

firstTimeDownload.message: Ascendara will continue to download games in the background if you close the application. You can stop the download at any time by clicking the action button then clicking the "Stop Download" button.
firstTimeDownload.title: Downloading on Ascendara

downloads.noDownloadsMessage: You're not downloading anything right now, start a download to track its progress here.
downloads.noFilesError: Received no files error from downloader. Download link most likely was removed from the source
downloads.retryDownloadDescription: Automatically retrying downloads is currently not implemented. To retry the download, cancel and delete the failed download here then search for the game again and download it again.
downloads.stoppedDescription: The download has been stopped. To start the download again, you will need to search for it and download it from the search page.
downloads.verificationFailedDesc: Some game files could not be verified. This may be due to corrupted downloads or antivirus interference.
downloads.verificationSuccessDesc: All game files have been verified
downloads.verifyingDescription: Ascendara is verifying the game files. This may also take a while depending on the game size.
downloads.waitingDescription: qBittorrent is looking for peers to connect to download pieces of the torrent file from other users and upload to them in turn. Others may be able to see what you're downloading and/or determine your public IP address.

earlyPreview.alreadyVoted: You have already voted for this feature
earlyPreview.debugInfo: Access debug logs to help diagnose and fix any technical issues you encounter.
earlyPreview.debugLogError: Failed to open debug logs folder
earlyPreview.description: View and vote the different experimental features in the early builds of Ascendare before they are released. Your feedback and vote matters and will help shape Ascendara.
earlyPreview.discordInfo: Join the Discord community to request new features and discuss ideas with other users.
earlyPreview.getOnExperimental: In order to see and vote on the latest experimental features, you need to get on Experimental build of Ascendara. Either restart Ascendara completely to trigger an update check or install the latest Experimental build from the download page.
earlyPreview.noFeatures: No experimental features available at the moment.
earlyPreview.reportInfo: Found a bug? Report it directly to the server and the issue will be investigated.

active.description: This feature is currently active in the early build and ready for testing
active.title: Active

deprecated.description: This feature is still present but will be removed in a future update
deprecated.title: Deprecated

implemented.description: This feature has been successfully implemented and is now in the released version
implemented.title: Implemented

trashed.description: This feature has been discarded and will not be implemented
trashed.title: Trashed

earlyPreview.title: Early Preview Dashboard
earlyPreview.votedDown: You said this feature has problems
earlyPreview.votedUp: You said this feature works great
earlyPreview.warning: These features are in early development and may be unstable. You are using at your own risk.

gameCard.ratingTooltip: This is an average rating from others who have downloaded and played this game on Ascendara.

gameScreen.helpOthers: Take a moment to rate and review this game out of 5 stars. Your feedback helps others understand the game's quality and reliability.
gameScreen.noDetailsDescription: No details available for this game.
gameScreen.noScreenshotsDescription: No screenshots available for this game.
gameScreen.noSummaryDescription: No summary description available for this game.

library.addGameDescription1: Add your own games or import from Steam.
library.addGameDescription2: Add a game to your Ascendara library to easily launch it and track play time. No files will be modified when adding a game.

backups.autoBackupDesc: Automatically backup save data when game closes
backups.backupSuccessDesc: Successfully backed up save data for {{game}}
backups.createBackupFirst: Create a backup first to see it listed here.
backups.pleaseWait: Please wait while Ascendara retrieves your backups...
backups.restoreSpecificWarningDesc: You are about to restore save data for {{game}} from the backup created on {{backup}}.
backups.restoreWarningDesc: You are about to restore save data for {{game}} from your latest backup.
backups.restoreWarningGameClosed: Make sure the game is not running before proceeding.
backups.restoreWarningOverwrite: This will overwrite any current save files with the backup version.
backups.waitingBackup: Please wait while your save data is being backed up...
backups.waitingRestore: Please wait while your save data is being restored...

library.cannotRunDev: Cannot run games in developer mode
library.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{game}} from your library? This will remove the game from your Ascendara library and delete all associated files. This action cannot be undone.
library.enterMoreChars: Image results will appear here as you type
library.importFailedDesc: There was a problem importing your Steam games. Please try again or check your directory.
library.importSteamGamesDescription: Choose the steamapps directory you want to import in and Ascendara will import all the games in that directory. Online, DLC, version tags and other metadata will be skipped while adding the games.
library.importSuccessDesc: Your Steam games have been imported successfully. Some game covers along with executable paths may be missing or incorrect, you can fix this by updating the game info.
library.importingGamesDesc: Please wait while your Steam games are being imported. This may take a few minutes depending on your library size.
library.launchErrorMessage: Failed to run {{game}}. Sometimes game executables are not named the same as the game name. Please make sure Ascendara is trying to run the correct file.
library.lessThanMinute: Less than a minute on this game
library.neverPlayed: You haven't played this game yet
library.noResultsFound: No results found. Be precise with your search.

rateGame.commentPlaceholder: e.g., I had a good time playing but...
rateGame.description: Share your experience with {{game}}. Your rating helps other players determine if {{game}} is worth playing.
rateGame.errorDesc: Unable to submit your rating. Please try again later.
rateGame.missingRatingDesc: Please select a rating before submitting
rateGame.title: Rate {{game}}

library.searchGameCover: Search Ascendara for an image cover
library.searchGameCoverNotice: Covers will be searched from the current indexed SteamRIP source.
library.shortcutError: Error creating shortcut. Maybe the executable path doesn't exist?
library.steamNotRunningMessage: Online-Fix games require Steam to be running. Please start Steam and make sure you're signed into your account then launch the game again.
library.steamappsDirectoryMissingCommon: The selected directory does not contain any games. Please select the `common` directory within the steamapps directory.

vrWarning.description: This is a virtual reality game and may require you to launch the game through SteamVR or your Meta Quest app. Running the game directly may cause your headset to not connect to the game.
vrWarning.learnMore: Learn More About Running VR Games
vrWarning.title: VR Games and Ascendara

profile.levelProgress: Earn experience and level up by playing games on Ascendara!
profile.notreallol: This level is based on your playtime and launches. It's completely local and not uploaded to any servers.
profile.playTimeDistribution: Distribution of playtime across your top 5 played games

search.indexedInformationDescription: Ascendara uses a custom developed database to store game links and information, which is updated monthly. No game files are ever stored on Ascendara servers.

server-status.api-description: Ascendara's main API handles game information, analytics, and reports.
server-status.check-connection: Check your internet connection and restart Ascendara.
server-status.description: View current status and server health information
server-status.healthy-description: All servers are running and responding as expected.
server-status.lfs-description: Large File Server handles bigger files like update files.
server-status.storage-description: Storage service handles small background assets.
server-status.title: Server Status
server-status.unhealthy-description: The following servers are currently experiencing issues:

settings.additionalGameInfoDescription: Ascendara Xtra allows you to setup a game information provider, letting you read additional information about all games.
settings.ascendaraAnalyticsDescription: Help improve Ascendara by sending usage data. This data is anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.
settings.ascendaraUpdatesDescription: Automatically download new versions of Ascendara and ask you to install them when ready
settings.ascendaraWorkshopDownloaderDescription: The Workshop Downloader allows you to download items from the Steam Workshop without needing to have an account.
settings.autoCreateShortcutsDescription: Automatically create shortcuts on desktop for games that run successfully for the first time
settings.buildSwitchReload: You'll need to reload Ascendara in order to queue the update file for the Experimental Build. Would you like to do this now?
settings.cannotCheckDependencies: Cannot check dependencies on this system
settings.cannotDisableTorrent: Switch to SteamRIP source before disabling torrent support
settings.customSourcesDescription: Custom sources will allow you to add you more Ascendara approved sources to your search.
settings.customThreadCountDesc: Higher values may improve download speed but require more CPU power and memory. Maximum: 32 threads
settings.downloadLocationWarning: Ascendara cannot write files to the chosen directory. Change was not saved.
settings.downloadThreadsDescription: Download threads determine how many simultaneous connections are used when downloading

downloadThreadsPresets.normal: Normal (4 threads) - Recommended for most users
downloadThreadsPresets.veryHigh: Very High (12 threads) - For fast connections

settings.downloaderRunningWarning: You cannot change these settings while a download is in progress
settings.earlyReleasePreviewDesc: Install versions of Ascendara with new features before they're officially released. Help improve Ascendara by testing and reporting issues.

extraLanguagesPanel.additionalLangListDesc: Choose from an additional 93 languages. These languages will be translated on your computer.
extraLanguagesPanel.downloadToolDesc: You need to have the Ascendara Translation Tool installed in order to select more languages. Click Continue to download the tool automatically.
extraLanguagesPanel.title: Ascendara Languages
extraLanguagesPanel.translatingDialogDesc: Ascendara is translating the selected language. This may take a few minutes, you can leave this but do not close Ascendara.

settings.fitgirlRepacksDescription: Access FitGirl's over 5500 games all on Ascendara. Games are sourced through the Hydralibrary and matched with images using game data services. There are no categories or weights supported for these games, they will seem completely random.

gameBackup.description: Select a directory to enable and configure Ludusavi game save backups. Choose which games to backup in your library.
gameBackup.skipManifestCheckDesc: Skip checking if backing up the game is having issues. Only enable if you know what you're doing.
gameBackup.title: Game Backups

settings.gameSourcesDescription: Ascendara primarily uses SteamRIP as its trusted source for games
settings.giantBombDescription: GiantBomb provides game information from a community-driven gaming wiki with brief descriptions. Requires an API key.
settings.giantBombLearnHowtoGet: Learn how to get API key
settings.highThreadWarning: High thread counts may cause download issues. Consider using 4-8 threads for better reliability.
settings.igdbApiKeyDescription: IGDB provides more detailed game information with developer-backed database and official game entries. Requires you to have a Twitch account and get a client ID and secret.
settings.igdbLearnHowtoGet: Learn how to set this up
settings.languageSetNote: NOTE: This will not change game names, tags, or anything else to do with the games provided
settings.languageSettingsDescription: Choose your preferred language for the UI
settings.matureContentDescription: Allow games with mature themes to appear in search results
settings.noLudusaviToolDesc: You need to have Ludusavi downloaded in order to use the backup/restore feature on Ascendara. Click Continue to download the tool automatically.
settings.noTorrentToolDesc: You need to have the Ascendara Torrent Handler installed in order to use the torrent feature on Ascendara. Click Continue to download the tool automatically.
settings.notificationsDescription: Send desktop notifications when downloads finish or fail
settings.onlyWindowsSupported: Only Windows is supported for now
settings.onlyWindowsSupported2: This feature is only on Windows
settings.quickLaunchDescription: Keep Ascendara running in the background after you close it in order to speed up future launches
settings.reinstallDependenciesDesc: If a game isn't running correctly, you can try reinstalling all the crucial libraries it needs to run
settings.showOldDownloadLinksDescription: Use the Ascendara Timemachine to fetch old download links for games. Some game versions may not work or be available.
settings.sideScrollBarDescription: Show a scroll bar on the side of the application window
settings.sourceChangeReload: You need to reload Ascendara after changing the game source. All cached data will be cleared when you switch sources.
settings.steamripDescription: SteamRIP is the primary source for Ascendara, providing a secure and reliable collection of games with regular updates.
settings.timeMachineDisabledFitgirl: Ascendara Timemachine is not available when using FitGirl Repacks as the game source.
settings.title: Ascendara Preferences
settings.torrentDescription: Enable Ascendara's torrent functionality. This feature requires qBittorrent to be installed and is recommended for experienced users only.

torrentWarningDialog.description: Please read this carefully before enabling torrent functionality:
torrentWarningDialog.legalWarning: Downloading copyrighted content may be illegal in your region. You are responsible for your own actions.
torrentWarningDialog.qbitWarning: This feature requires qBittorrent. Make sure it is properly configured with your VPN.
torrentWarningDialog.title: Enable Torrent Support
torrentWarningDialog.vpnWarning: Your IP address will be visible to other peers. Use a VPN to protect your privacy and avoid potential legal issues.

userSettings.description: Update your display name that is shown on this page. You can also use this name for Goldberg cracks.
userSettings.directoryPermissionError: No write permissions for selected directory
userSettings.title: Change Your Name
userSettings.useForGoldberg: Use this name for Goldberg cracks

settings.warningDescription: Ascendara is designed as a testing platform for video games, allowing users to evaluate gameplay, performance, and compatibility before making a purchase decision. Ascendara strongly encourages users to support game developers by purchasing games they enjoy.
settings.warningSupportDevelopers: Game developers invest significant time, resources, and creativity into creating the experiences we all enjoy. Your purchase directly supports their ability to continue making great games and sustains the gaming industry.
settings.warningSupportDevelopersCallToAction: Please support the developers by purchasing games you enjoy.

downloads.content: Track your active downloads, see progress, and manage download speeds all in one place.
downloads.title: Downloads

final.content: Thank you for downloading Ascendara! If you encounter any issues, right click anywhere on the app and select "Report Issue".
final.title: Welcome to Ascendara

gameLibrary.content: Your downloaded games will appear here. Launch, manage and organize your collection from this tab.
gameLibrary.title: Game Library

navigationBar.content: This is your navigation bar, it is where you can access all main features.
navigationBar.title: Navigation Bar

profile.content: This is your Ascendara profile. You can level up having high playtime and playing games, it's all for fun! Nothing will ever be uploaded to any servers.
profile.title: Profile

resizing.content: Too big or too small? You can resize the navigation bar by dragging these corners!
resizing.title: Resizing Navigation

searchDownload.content: This is where you can search and download games. Browse through the massive collection and find your next favorite game.
searchDownload.title: Search & Download

serverStatus.content: This green dot indicates that all systems are operational. Click it anytime to check detailed server status.
serverStatus.title: Server Status

settings.content: Customize Ascendara to your liking. Change themes, download locations, and more from the settings page.
settings.title: Settings

tour.title: Ascendara Guide
tour.welcome: Welcome! Let's take a quick tour of Ascendara's interface.

welcome.allRequiredDependenciesHaveBeenInstalled: All required dependencies have been successfully installed. Welcome to Ascendara.
welcome.analyticsDesc: Share anonymous usage data to help improve your experience
welcome.areYouSureYouWantToSkip: Are you sure you want to skip installing dependencies? Some games may not work properly.
welcome.ascendaraNeverCollects: Ascendara never collects personal information or game data. All analytics are anonymous and used solely to improve Ascendara.
welcome.ascendaraNeverCollectsPersonalInfo: Ascendara never collects personal information or game data. All analytics are anonymous and used solely to improve Ascendara.
welcome.automaticUpdatesDesc: Get the latest features and improvements as soon as they're available
welcome.bePartOfImprovingDesc: Join the hundreds of others helping improve Ascendara just by using it
welcome.bugFixesDesc: Receive fixes for any issues automatically
welcome.cannotWriteWarning: Looks like Ascendara cannot write files to the chosen directory. Please select a different directory.
welcome.chooseHowToHelp: Choose how you'd like to help make Ascendara better for everyone.
welcome.chooseHowYouWantToReceiveUpdates: Choose how you want to receive updates for Ascendara.
welcome.chooseWhenToUpdateAscendaraYourself: Choose when to update Ascendara yourself. You'll be notified when updates are available, but they won't install automatically.
welcome.clickTheExtensionIcon: Click the extension icon and enable the handler when you install it
welcome.dependenciesDesc: If you are playing on a new PC or have recently installed Windows, Ascendara can help you install these essential components to ensure the best experience
welcome.everyUpdateIsInspired: Every update is inspired by your feedback. Thank you for being part of the journey.
welcome.failedToInstallDependencies: Failed to install dependencies. Please try again or skip if the issue persists.
welcome.freshNewLookDesc: Your favorite game testing app, now with a modern design and customizable themes that you've been requesting
welcome.getTheAscendaraDownloadHandlerExtension: Get the Ascendara Download Handler extension for Chrome or Firefox.
welcome.haveWine: I have Wine, take me to the tour
welcome.helpIdentifyAndFix: Help identify and fix issues faster
welcome.helpIdentifyAndFixDesc: All errors will be automatically sent to analytics with an urgent flag, putting them at the top of the list
welcome.iHaveReadAndAgreeTo: I have read and agree to Ascendara's
welcome.iHaveTheseTakeMeToTheTour: I have these, take me to the tour
welcome.improvedUXDesc: Things are broken up into more pages and better organized to make sure you can find what you need
welcome.influenceFutureFeaturesDesc: Help Ascendara understand your needs and influence future updates
welcome.lightningFastDesc: V7 is optimized for speed and performance to make your experience smoother and faster than ever
welcome.makeSureYouHaveEnoughDiskSpaceInTheSelec: Make sure you have enough disk space in the selected location
welcome.notEnoughSpaceWarning: Woah! You have less than 40 GB of free space on the selected drive. Consider clearing some space or selecting a different drive.
welcome.optOutOfSharing: Opt out of sharing anonymous usage data. You can always enable this later in settings if you change your mind.
welcome.optOutOfSharingAnonymousUsageData: Opt out of sharing anonymous usage data. You can always enable this later in settings if you change your mind.
welcome.personalizeYourExperience: Personalize your experience with a theme that suits your style
welcome.pleaseWaitAndRespondToAdminPrompts: Please wait and respond to any administrator prompts that appear. Do not close the application.
welcome.pythonMustBeInstalled: Python must be installed on your computer in order to run Ascendara on this operating system
welcome.securityPatchesDesc: Stay protected with important security updates
welcome.seeEntireList: See the entire list of 105 languages
welcome.selectWhereYouWantYourGamesToBeDownloade: Select where you want your games to be downloaded
welcome.smartOrganizationDesc: New filtering and sorting options to manage your game searching and downloading
welcome.startTheDownload: You sit back and relax while your game downloads and extracts in Ascendara
welcome.theExtensionBlocksKnownProviders: The extension listens for downloads from known providers and stops them before they start in your browser, then sending it to Ascendara to download
welcome.thisIsWhereAllYourDownloadedGamesWillBeS: This is where all your downloaded games will be stored
welcome.welcomeToAscendaraDescription: Now you won't have to worry about extracting, installing, or moving files. Before we start, please read and agree to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
welcome.whenYouClickADownloadLink: When you start a download from a known provider, the extension will automatically stop the download in your browser and start it for you in Ascendara
welcome.wineMustBeInstalled: Wine must be installed to run Windows games on your system
welcome.youCanAddMoreLater: You can add more directories in preferences later
welcome.youCanChangeThisLater: You can always update your language later in Settings.
welcome.youCanChangeThisSettingLater: You can change this later in Settings.
welcome.youWillReceiveAdminPrompts: You will receive administrator prompts from official Microsoft installers to install the required components. Your computer may need to restart after installation.
welcome.yourContinuedSupport: Your continued support has made Ascendara what it is today. Ascendara has been completely rebuilt from the ground up with a new look and feel you've been asking for.

downloadFailure.description: The workshop item download failed. This could be due to:
downloadFailure.reasons: ['The item may be private or restricted', 'SteamCMD connection issues', 'Insufficient disk space', 'Invalid workshop item URL']
downloadFailure.suggestion: Please verify the item is public and try again. If the issue persists, try restarting Ascendara.
downloadFailure.title: Download Failed

workshopDownloader.installSteamCMDDescription: First, we need to install SteamCMD. This CLI tool allows you to download items from the Steam Workshop without a UI.
workshopDownloader.mainDescription: Paste workshop item links here to download them. Ascendara will add them to a directory for you to manage yourself.
workshopDownloader.welcomeDescription: Here you can download items from the Steam Workshop without needing to have an account.
